resources.string: Basic code that will help beginner to build any HTML page from scratch and also open it in WEB browser. Explained how to save file correctly.
To start to build a website we do not need any fancy programms and extra software. Any computer will be able to do the job, regardless its specifications.\n So we begin ...

Open Notepad (preinstalled on all Windows machines), icon on the left, or download Notepad ++, icon on the right. Believe it or not, that is basically the software that is used for creating most of the programms. Then add code below and save file as index.html. Or give any other name, but keep .html extention.
Explanation of font sizes \n Make your text smaller, bigger, just as you like it.\n Also provided some examples fo changing font faces, so you will be able to make your page look more beautiful

In HTML font size is available in 6 different variations. To hange the size of the text simply wrap text into corresponding tags. All tags are listed below ... \n Please note that all content goest into BODY part of a page. In the future only code from body part will be displayed.
